DOC.brief_summary: This study focuses on the development of the Fathers Supporting Success in Preschoolers (FSSP) Program, which combines evidence-based parenting interventions with Dialogic Reading to engage fathers in and improve parenting and child behavior.
DOC.brief_title: Enhancing Father's Ability to Support Their Preschool Child
DOC.criteria: Male Guardian Child enrolled in partnering Head Start site Mental Health issues that prohibit involvement in groupbased prevention study (e.g., psychosis)
